actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide additional standards to regulate the proper use of the penalty mail privilege on an official basis by Government departments.

summary.text: Sets requirements for the mailing of matter in excess of five thousand identical pieces, under the penalty mail privilege, on an official basis by Government departments. Requires that information be published including the following: (1) the purpose of the mailing; (2) the source of the mailing list of persons or organizations; and (3) the amount or equivalent amount of postage due for mailing such matter. (Adds 39 U.S.C. 3204(c)(1))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide additional standards to regulate the proper use of the penalty mail privilege on an official basis by Government departments.
